headline: Kimco Realty Corporation Announces 2024 Dividend Tax Treatment
summary: JERICHO, N.Y., Jan. 27, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Kimco Realty® (NYSE: KIM), a real estate investment trust (REIT) and leading owner and operator of high-quality, open-air, grocery-anchored shopping centers and mixed-use properties in the United States, announced today the 2024 tax treatment of its common stock and preferred stock dividend distributions. The allocations as they will be reported on Form 1099-DIV are as follows: Common Shares (CUSIP # 49446R-10-9) Ex- Ordinary IncomeCapital Gains D

content.title: Kimco Realty Corporation Announces 2024 Dividend Tax Treatment
content.summary: JERICHO, N.Y., Jan. 27, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Kimco Realty® (NYSE: KIM), a real estate investment trust (REIT) and leading owner and operator of high-quality, open-air, grocery-anchored shopping centers and mixed-use properties in the United States, announced today the 2024 tax treatment of its common stock and preferred stock dividend distributions. The allocations as they will be reported on Form 1099-DIV are as follows: Common Shares (CUSIP # 49446R-10-9) Ex- Ordinary IncomeCapital Gains D
